response.answer: To send documents, click the Documents link in the left navigation pane, then click the Add button. Select the checkboxes for the documents you want to add, click Update. Select all documents you want to send, click eSign Documents, validate email address, and then click Send.
The Prior Policies tab provides current carrier information returned from the Current carrier report returned with ALH.
descarray: Job Aid - Report Ordering – Auto

response.answer: The Retrieve Account Policies button is used to retrieve existing Nationwide policies on the PolicyCenter account. The system automatically engages this function if underlying policies exists on the PolicyCenter account.
descarray: Job Aid - Umbrella Full Application – Underlying Policies on PolicyCenter – Umbrella
Job Aid - Add an Underlier – Umbrella

response.answer: To edit policy renewals  1. Only unbound renewals can be edited. If the renewal has been bound, a policy change is required.  2. To edit an unbound renewal, go to the Summary screen of the policy.  3. From Work Orders in Progress section, select the Renewal Work Order number.  4. Click the Edit button at the top of the screen area, read the pop-up message and click the OK button, and on the Policy Info screen, click the Coverages link in the left navigation pane. 5. Make all edits, click Quote, click the Policy Review link in the left navigation pane, review changes, and click the Renew button. Click OK on the pop-up screen.
descarray: Job Aid - Policy Renewal Process (Team Tab)

response.answer: The Create Policy button is used when you need to add an AgentCenter policy, such as a Nationwide affiliated company (Allied, or Harleysville), a Nationwide-Hagerty, a Powersports, or a Private Client underlier to the submission.
descarray: Job Aid - Umbrella Full Application – Underlying Policies on AgentCenter – Umbrella
Job Aid - Add an Underlier – Umbrella

response.answer: To add a fifth vehicle to an existing policy:  1. On the summary screen of the source policy, click the Actions button and select 5th vehicle.  2. Complete the 5th vehicle quote using the Create 5th Vehicle Policy job aid as your guide.
descarray: How to Quote a New Customer with 5 or more Vehicles
Create 5th Vehicle Policy

response.answer: To change a mortgagee, on the Policy Info screen, click the Mortgagee/Additional Interest link. You can select and edit existing mortgagees or add new ones by clicking Add under the right section. Populate fields and click OK. Or, you can select the existing mortgagee and click on Remove to delete it.
descarray: Job Aid - Add Mortagee (Third Party)

response.answer: If your coverage question is regarding an underwriting issue, please contact your underwriter directly. Otherwise, you may type **trainer** to reach a live person, or you can ask again with more detail.

I can help answer several questions commonly asked by agents, such as **where do I start a quote,** **how to order reports,** or **what does this term mean.** Feel free to ask me a question!

response.answer: **Rate** is equivalent to **quote** in PolicyCenter.
**Insured location** is equivalent to **location exposure** in PolicyCenter.
Right now, you can ask me to define a PolicyCenter term, explain how to find or complete a simple task, or find the right Job Aid or Learning Snack for you.
**Bind** or **release** are equivalent to **issue** in PolicyCenter.
**Electronic memos** or **follow ups** are equivalent to **activities** in PolicyCenter.
**Requote** or **rate again** are equivalent to **edit** in PolicyCenter.
**Policy period** or **policy term** are equivalent to **effective and inspiration date** in PolicyCenter.
**Installment fee** or **service fee** are equivalent to **installment** in PolicyCenter.
**IRT** or **change of state** are equivalent **state transfer (IRT)** in PolicyCenter.
**Requote** or **rate again** are equivalent to **edit** in PolicyCenter.
Okay, please click below if you'd like to speak to a trainer. Please note, Training Connection hours are Monday-Friday **9:30 a.m. to 7:30 p.m. EST** (excluding holidays).
**New business** is equivalent to **submission** in PolicyCenter.
**Brand new belongings** or **replacement cost contents** are equivalent to **brand new belongings** in PolicyCenter.
Thank you for your feedback. I'll let the team know, and we'll work to make this better.
I have been told a lot of people worked on me, but as far as I am concerned, I belong to Nationwide!
**Mailing address** or **property address** are equivalent to **policy address** in PolicyCenter.
**Incomplete or held charge** is equivalent to **preemption** in PolicyCenter.
